SELECT NVL(MAX(dept_no), 0) + 1 FROM DEPARTMENTS
INSERT INTO DEPARTMENTS (dept_no, parent_dept_no, name, mgr_no, reg_date) VALUES (#{deptNo}, #{parentDeptNo}, #{deptName}, #{mgrNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT level, d.dept_no AS deptNo, d.name AS deptName, d.parent_dept_no AS parentDeptNo, (SELECT COUNT(e.emp_no) FROM EMPLOYEES e WHERE e.dept_no = d.dept_no) AS empCnt FROM DEPARTMENTS d START WITH d.parent_dept_no = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR d.dept_no = d.parent_dept_no ORDER BY d.dept_no
